hadiths.text: Jabir narrated:"We were with the Prophet (S) on a journey when it started to rain on us, so the Prophet (S) said: 'Whoever wishes, let him perform Salat in his place

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ إِذَا كَانَ الْمَطَرُ فَالصَّلاَةُ فِي الرِّحَالِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About 'When It Rains Then Salat Is Performed At One's Place'
